question.body: In facilitated diffusion, molecules move through pores from areas of ____________ concentration to areas of ____________ concentration.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Facilitated diffusion is still diffusion. Molecules must move down their concentration gradients.
Correct. In diffusion, molecules move from areas of high concentration to areas of low concentration. “Facilitated” just means the molecules need some help.
Incorrect. In facilitated diffusion, as in all diffusion, molecules must move down their concentration gradients.
